dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Hey Bob, how was your day?

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: Hi Alice! My day was great. I finally finished that project I've been working on.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: That's awesome, Bob! How do you feel about the outcome?

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: I'm really proud of it. I think it turned out better than I expected.
